「通話は録音されます」…アポ電撃退する電話機

05 Nov 2019, 04:42



「アポ電」対策の機能を強化したシャープの新型電話機（大阪市で）

　特殊詐欺グループなどが高齢者から資産状況などを聞き出す「アポ電（アポイントメント電話）」の急増を受け、シャープが警視庁や大阪府警と協力し、対策機能を高めた新たな固定電話機を開発した。
　「電話が鳴るとつい出てしまい、被害に遭う高齢者が多い」という警察の助言を基に、番号を登録していない相手からの電話は着信音が鳴る前に「この通話は防犯のため録音されます」と警告。不審な電話に出る機会を減らす。
　それでも相手が切らない場合は短時間の着信音が鳴った後、受話器を取らなくても相手に名乗るように促すメッセージが自動的に流れる。相手の声も本体から聞こえるため、電話に出る判断材料になる。
　会話途中でも、ボタンを押せば通話を切り、相手の電話番号を自動で着信拒否登録する。こうした機能は初期設定済みで、高齢者でも購入してすぐに使える。１１月１４日に発売予定で、想定価格は税抜き１万６０００円前後（子機１台付き）。
text:
“The call will be recorded”… Apo repel phone

05 Nov 2019, 04:42



Sharp's new phone with enhanced “Apo-den” measures (in Osaka City)

In response to the rapid increase in “Apoden (appointment phone)” where special fraud groups and others ask about the status of assets from the elderly, Sharp has developed a new fixed telephone with enhanced countermeasure functions in cooperation with the Metropolitan Police Department and Osaka Prefectural Police.
Based on the advice of the police that “there are many elderly people who will be damaged when the phone rings”, the call from the other party who has not registered the number will be sent before the ring tone sounds. It will be recorded. " Reduce opportunities to answer suspicious calls.
】 If the party still does not hang up, after a short ringing tone, a message prompting you to name yourself automatically without taking the handset. The other party's voice can also be heard from the main unit, so it can be used as a basis for answering calls.
During a conversation, press the button to hang up and automatically register the caller's phone number as a call rejection. These features are pre-configured and can be used immediately by older people. Scheduled to be released on November 14, the estimated price is around 16,000 yen excluding tax (with one handset).
